TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WindowsTokenRoleProvider extends System.Web.Security.RoleProvider

summary.span: 通过 Windows 组成员资格获取 ASP.NET 应用程序的角色信息。

span.span: Gets role information for an ASP.NET application from Windows group membership.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是只读的角色成员资格提供程序检索基于 Windows 安全组的 Windows 用户的角色信息。The class is a read-only role-membership provider that retrieves role information for a Windows user based on Windows security groups. 它是最有用，使用 Windows 身份验证模式的 IIS 身份验证设置其中禁用匿名身份验证的 ASP.NET 应用程序。It is most useful with ASP.NET applications that use Windows authentication mode where the IIS authentication settings disable anonymous authentication. 你可以配置 ASP.NET 应用程序以允许或拒绝访问，基于在某个特定的 Windows 组的用户的成员身份。You can configure ASP.NET applications to allow or deny access based on a user's membership in a particular Windows group. 不能使用类创建或删除角色或修改基于 Windows 组成员身份的角色的成员身份。You cannot use the class to create or delete roles or modify the membership of a role that is based on Windows group membership. 此功能由 Windows 操作系统的系统管理。This functionality is managed by the Windows operating system. 类只支持和方法抽象类。The class supports only the and methods of the abstract class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件。The following example shows the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它指定应用程序使用 Windows 身份验证和类，以检索其角色信息的 Windows 用户。It specifies that the application uses both Windows authentication and the class to retrieve role information for Windows users. 该元素指定只有 builtin\ 管理员组中的用户允许访问应用程序。The element specifies that only users in the BUILTIN\Administrators group are allowed access to the application. ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: public WindowsTokenRoleProvider ();
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Public Sub New ()
public: WindowsTokenRoleProvider();

span.span: Creates an instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 创建的实例将调用构造函数为应用程序的配置中指定的类。The constructor is called by ASP.NET to create an instance of the class as specified in the configuration for the application. 此构造函数不应在代码中使用。This constructor is not intended to be used from your code.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string ApplicationName { get; set; }
.property instance string ApplicationName
Public Overrides Property ApplicationName As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ApplicationName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the application.
The name of the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与其他角色提供程序，如不同、类不将角色信息关联的应用程序。Unlike other role providers such as the , the class does not associate role information with an application. 相反，角色信息是来自本地计算机上的 Windows 组。Instead, the role information is taken from the Windows groups on the local computer. 在同一服务器上的多个应用程序使用类始终共享相同的角色信息。Multiple applications on the same server that use the class always share the same role information. 尽管`applicationName`可以对应用程序的 Web.config 文件中配置属性不用于检索其角色信息。Although the `applicationName` can be configured in the Web.config file for the application, the property is not used to retrieve role information. ## Examples 下面的示例演示中的元素`system.web`的 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件的部分。The following example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它指定应用程序的实例并设置属性`MyApplication`。It specifies the application's instance and sets the property to `MyApplication`. ``` ```

summary.span: 获取用户所属的 Windows 组的列表。

span.span: Gets a list of the Windows groups that a user is in.

returns.span: 一个字符串数组，其中包含指定用户所属的所有 Windows 组的名称。

span.span: A string array containing the names of all the Windows groups that the specified user is in.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法类来从 Windows 操作系统中检索指定用户的 Windows 组的列表。This method is called by the class to retrieve from the Windows operating system a list of the Windows groups that the specified user is in. LOGON_USER 服务器变量由标识可以仅针对当前登录的用户，调用方法。The method can be called only for the currently logged-on user, as identified by the LOGON_USER server variable. 如果在提供的值`username`参数不是当前登录的用户的名称引发。If the value supplied in the `username` parameter is not the name of the currently logged-on user, a is thrown. 有关详细信息 ASP.NET 和 Windows 身份验证，请参阅[ASP.NET 身份验证](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1)。For more information an ASP.NET and Windows authentication, see [ASP.NET Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法来检索指定用户角色的列表，并将绑定到的角色列表控件。The following code example uses the method to retrieve a list of roles for a specified user and binds the list of roles to a control. 启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例，请参阅。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider/CS/viewrolescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider/VB/viewrolesvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: if the specified user is in the specified Windows role; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使你能够检查用户是否为所描述的常见 Windows 角色之一枚举。The method enables you to check whether a user is in one of the common Windows roles described by the enumeration. 此方法很有用的应用程序本地化为多种语言。This method is useful for applications that are localized into multiple languages. 此重载方法不是属于基类和仅可以通过强制转换为属性类作为类型。This overload of the method is not part of the base class and can only be accessed by casting the property of the class as the type. 你可以调用仅为当前登录的用户，明确要求由在 LOGON_USER 服务器变量的方法。You can call the method only for the currently logged-on user, as identified by the LOGON_USER server variable. 如果在提供的值`username`参数不是当前登录的用户的名称引发。If the value supplied in the `username` parameter is not the name of the currently logged-on user, an is thrown. 仅为标识 LOGON_USER 服务器变量的当前登录的用户调用方法。 method can only be called for the currently logged-on user identified by the LOGON_USER server variable. 当前登录的用户必须是 Windows 身份验证的用户。The current logged on user must be a Windows authenticated user. 有关 ASP.NET 和 Windows 身份验证的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 身份验证](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1)。For more information on ASP.NET and Windows authentication, see [ASP.NET Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1). ## Examples 下面的代码示例以编程方式检查当前登录的用户是否在管理员角色允许用户查看应用程序的角色信息之前。The following code example programmatically checks whether the currently logged-on user is in the Administrators role before allowing the user to view roles information for the application. 启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例，请参阅。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider/CS/ViewRoles2cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider/VB/ViewRoles2vb.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由调用类和方法属性来确定用户是否属于某个 Windows 组。The method is called by the class and the method of the property to determine whether a user is in a Windows group. 你可以调用仅为当前登录的用户，明确要求由在 LOGON_USER 服务器变量的方法。You can call the method only for the currently logged-on user, as identified by the LOGON_USER server variable. 当前登录的用户必须是 Windows 身份验证的用户。The current logged-on user must be a Windows authenticated user. 有关 ASP.NET 和 Windows 身份验证的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 身份验证](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1)。For more information on ASP.NET and Windows authentication, see [ASP.NET Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1). ## Examples 下面的代码示例以编程方式检查当前登录的用户是否在管理员角色允许用户查看应用程序的角色信息之前。The following code example programmatically checks whether the currently logged-on user is in the Administrators role before allowing the user to view roles information for the application. 启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例，请参阅。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see .
